documentation.text:
@title  TokenSaleContract - A sale contract of token plus uniswap
         implementation that is backed by ether.
Ability to add users after sale ended in nonsaleable blocks

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "not enough time to vest, please try later"

arguments.value: not enough time to vest, please try later

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "not enough time to vest, please try later"

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: TokenSaleContract - A sale contract of token plus uniswap         implementation that is backed by ether.

issueNonSaleTokens(address,uint256,uint8.notice: Ability to add users after sale ended in nonsaleable blocks
